insert into customer_order_daily (id, report_time, customer_id, customer_name, order_quantity, waybill_quantity, anomaly_waybill_quantity, goods_type, amount, tonnage, income_freight, income_anomaly_cost, expend_freight, expend_anomaly_cost, gross_profit, gross_profit_rate, create_time ) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.reportTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orderQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.waybillQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.anomalyWaybillQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.goodsType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.tonnage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.incomeFreight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.incomeAnomalyCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.expendFreight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.expendAnomalyCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.grossProfit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.grossProfitRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select: SELECT SUBSTR( report_time, 1, 7 ) AS reportTime, id, customer_id AS customerId, customer_name AS customerName, SUM(order_quantity) as orderQuantity, SUM(waybill_quantity) AS waybillQuantity, SUM(anomaly_waybill_quantity) AS anomalyWaybillQuantity, goods_type AS goodsType, SUM(amount) AS amount, SUM(tonnage) AS tonnage, SUM(income_freight) AS incomeFreight, SUM(income_anomaly_cost) AS incomeAnomalyCost, SUM(expend_freight) AS expendFreight, SUM(expend_anomaly_cost) AS expendAnomalyCost FROM customer_order_daily GROUP BY customerId, goodsType, SUBSTR( reportTime, 1, 7 ), customerName, id ORDER BY reportTime DESC
